messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Teacher Discounts
messages.msgSnippet: What confused me about this were two things... 1.  catalog?  Guess that s what they call their web site. 2.  Retailer?  All our local book stores are retailers
messages.messageBody:
What confused me about this were two things...
1.  catalog?  Guess that's what they call their web site.

2.  Retailer?  All our local book stores are retailers too, right?  They give 10 - 20 percent discounts.  Maybe because Amazon is such a volume dealer, their prices are lower.  I really haven't paid that much attention.
Ann

Ron and Stephanie wrote:

>>Because we are a retailer, and not a wholesaler, the discounts listed
in our catalog, like the payment methods we are able to accept, apply
to all of our customers--individual, educational, institutional, and
corporate alike.<<

It looks like they are nicely saying that they have 1 discount, and that
everyone is able to get the same discount. But that is the one that is
already there. No special discounts for anyone :(
Stephanie
